scripts.start: sudo service postgresql start && npm run migration:run && sleep infinity
scripts.migration:create: npm run build && read -p 'Enter migration name: ' name && npx typeorm migration:create ./migrations/$name
scripts.migration:revert: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:revert -d ./dist/main.js
scripts.migration:run: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:run -d ./dist/main.js
